Cert.Tips: Tips: The site lacks SSL certificate, accessing may be risky.

CurrentTips.0: Paste you KEY and CRT content, and then save it.
CurrentTips.1: If the browser prompts that the certificate chain is incomplete, please check if the PEM certificate is correctly spliced correctly.
CurrentTips.2: PEM format certificate = domain name certificate .crt + root certificate (root_bundle).crt.
CurrentTips.3: When no SSL default site is specified, a site without SSL will use HTTPS to access the site with SSL enabled.
CurrentTips.4: If you cannot access HTTPS after enabling it, please check whether the security group has properly released port 443.

Cert.SaveErrorMsg: Please fill in the complete certificate content

SaveConfirm.Title: Certificate saving prompt
SaveConfirm.Content: If the current certificate content changes, the certificate information will be updated. Continue?

ForceHttpsConfirm.Title: Turn off forced HTTPS
ForceHttpsConfirm.Content: After disabling forced HTTPS, you need to clear the browser cache to see the effect. Would you like to proceed?

StatusConfirm.Start: About to turn on this site, are you sure to continue?
StatusConfirm.Stop: Unable to access when you turn off site, are you sure to continue?

LetFileTips.0: Please check domain resolution before applying, unresolved domain leads to audit failure.
LetFileTips.1: The certificate is valid for 3 months, supports wildcard domain. Auto-renew by default.
LetFileTips.2: If you uses CDN or redirect, you may not be able to apply and renew through file verification.
LetFileTips.3: When you do not specify a SSL default site, if you use HTTPS to access a site that does not have SSL enabled, you will directly access a site that has SSL enabled.

LetDnsTips.0: In DNS validation, we provide three automated DNS API, and provide manual mode.
LetDnsTips.1: The certificate can be renewed automatically by using the DNS API. In manual mode, the certificate needs to be reapplied after the certificate expires.
LetDnsTips.2: Before using the [aaPanel DNS Cloud Resolution] API, you need to confirm that the domain DNS for which you want to apply for SSL certificate is [Cloud Resolution].
LetDnsTips.3: Before using the [DNSPod/Ali Cloud DNS] API, you need to set the API key of the corresponding interface in the pop-up window.

DelHolder.Title: Delete certificate
DelHolder.Content: Are you sure to delete the certificate from the certificate holder?

Back.Title: Package Backup
Back.BlackContent: Will be restoring the site files and database, continue?

TopTips.0: A domain per line, the default port is 80
TopTips.2: To add another port, the format is www.domain.com:88

DirectoryConf.Content: Are you sure to create a independent URL rewrite rule for this subdirectory?
DirectoryConf.Content1: Are you sure to delete this subdirectory binding?

Tips.1: If the site cannot be accessed after the rewrite rules set, please try to reset to default.
Tips.2: You are able to modify rewrite rules, just save it after modification.

SiteDirectory.Content: Some programs need to specify a secondary directory as the working directory
SiteDirectory.Content1: Select your working directory click Save, e.g, ThinkPHP5, Laravel

Tips.0: After setting, you need to enter the password to access it.
Tips.1: For example, if I set the limit path /test/, then I need to enter the account password to access http://aaa.com/test/
Tips.2: Suffix: Indicates the suffix that is not allowed to access, if there are more than one, separate with
Tips.3: Path: Quote rules in this directory. e.g: /a/
Tips.4: For Example, if you want to deny http://test.com/a/index.php

Tips.2: * Limit of single IP accessing max concurrency
Tips.3: * Limit the max traffic limit per request (unit: KB)

Tips.1: If the site cannot be accessed after the rewrite rules set, please try to reset to default.
Tips.2: You are able to modify rewrite rules, just save it after modification.

Tips.0: This is primary configuration file of the site.
Tips.1: Do not modify it at will if you do not know configuration rules.

Tips.0: Select the version according to your program requirements
Tips.1: Try not to use PHP5.2 unless you have to, as this can reduce your server security
Tips.2: PHP7 does not support the MySQL extension. The default installation is mysqli and mysql-pdo
Tips.3: [Customize] You can customize the PHP connection information by selecting the available PHP connection configuration
Tips.5: Support TCP or UNIX configuration. Example: 192.168.1.25:9001 or unix:/tmp/php8.sock
Tips.6: When enabled, session files will be stored in a separate folder, not in a common storage location with other sites
Tips.7: Do not enable this option if you are saving sessions to caches such as memcache/redis in your PHP configuration

Tips.0: Type: The domain name selected or the path entered will be redirected to the specified URL
Tips.1: Target URL: Fill in the URL address you need to redirect to
Tips.2: Mode: use 301 for permanent redirection and 302 for temporary redirection
Tips.3: Keep URI parameters: Whether the redirected URL has the sub-path or parameters of the source URL
Tips.5: NOT Keep URI parameters: http://b.com/1.html ---> http://a.com
Tips.6: This is the configuration file of the load balancing. Not modify if you do not understand the configuration rules.

Tips.0: Proxy dir: When accessing this dir, the content of the target URL will be displayed (Advanced Needs)
Tips.1: Target URL:Fill in the website you need to proxy, the target URL must be an accessible URL
Tips.2: Sent Domain: Add the domain name to the request header and pass it to the proxy server
Tips.3: Content replacement: Nginx exclusive, replace the content of the website with the specified content

Tips.0: By default, resources are allowed to be accessed directly,
Tips.1: i.e, requests with empty HTTP_REFERER are not restricted.
Tips.2: Multiple URL suffixes and domains should be separated by comma (,), such as png,jpeg,zip,js
Tips.3: When hotlink protection is triggered, the 404 status is returned directly

LogsConfig.ScanContent: It is recommended to perform security analysis when the server load is low. This time, the
LogsConfig.ScanContent1: file will be scanned. It may take a long time. Do you want to continue?

Tips.0: Log analysis: Scan the logs(/www/wwwroot/.log) for requests with attack (types include:
Tips.2: Analyzed log data contains intercepted requests
Tips.3: By default, the last scan data is displayed (if not, please click log scan)
Tips.4: If the log file is too large, scanning may take a long time, please be patient

DelSite.ContentText1: This will delete the selected website profile.
DelSite.ContentText2: TIf the check box below is checked, the corresponding content will be deleted
DelSite.ContentText4: Verify the information twice and delete sites in batches
DelSite.ContentText7: Please calm down for a few seconds and confirm the following data to be deleted.
DelSite.ContentText8: Note: This directory may contain important data. Exercise caution when performing this operation.
DelSite.ContentText9: Note: This site is created earlier and may contain important data. Exercise caution when performing this operation.
DelSite.ContentText10: Note: This database is large and may contain important data. Exercise caution when performing this operation.
DelSite.ContentText11: Note: This site is created earlier and may contain important data. Exercise	caution when performing this operation.
DelSite.ContentText12: Risks: The database recycle bin function is not enabled at present. After the database is	deleted, the database will disappear forever!
DelSite.ContentText13: Risk: The file recycle bin function is disabled at present. After a site directory is	deleted, the site directory will disappear forever!
DelSite.ContentText14: Please read the above information to be deleted carefully to prevent site data from being deleted by mistake. Confirm that there are still
DelSite.ContentText15: Note: please read the above information carefully to prevent site data from being deleted by mistake
